Author: I Love Crypto Noda
Title: [ANN][ICO] CRYPTO NODA
Body: Crypto Noda is the first automated hosting service for connection, activation, analytics and maintenance of masternode.  Once a quarter, Crypto Noda commit to buy back CNOD tokens at 15% of the platform's revenue and then burn them, thereby creating a benefit of holding tokens for investors. This function will be performed by a smart contract, which is a guarantee of security.  Service Crypto Noda offers a set of original solutions that will help: â€¢Explore the features and reduce the risks of connecting to masternode with low liquidity.  The main feature is that the own token is a kind of rightor an asset inside our blockchain platform. We are not compelled to use the token in the payment of the Commission from receiving revenues. The size of the Commission hosting service the default is 20% of the net profit of connected nodes.  Private Sale officially started  Please visit cryptonoda.online                  https://www.reddit.com/user/CRYPTONODA                  https://twitter.com/CryptoNoda                  https://www.facebook.com/crypto.noda                  https://medium.com/@CryptoNoda
